text: Xiaonanmen is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is G11. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Songshan. Platform 2 is for Xindian or Taipower Building. == Around the station == * Ministry of National Defense * Judicial Yuan * Ministry of the Interior National Immigration Agency General Headquarters and Taipei Service Station * Taipei Fucheng * Sun Yun-suan Memorial Museum * Chunghwa Postal Museum * Ministry of Justice * National Museum of History * Taipei Botanical Garden * Taipei Municipal University of Education * Environmental Protection Administration (between this station and Ximen station) * Soochow University (Downtown Campus) * Taipei Municipal Jianguo High School * Nanmen Junior High School Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Xiaonanmen metro station
